sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT B_CLASSNAME,B_CREDATE,B_UPDDATE,B_CREATOR,B_PUBID,B_SOURCEID,case when upper(OPERATIONAL_STATUS)='ACTIVE' then 'Active'
when upper(OPERATIONAL_STATUS)='INACTIVE' then 'Inactive'
when Upper(OPERATIONAL_STATUS) ='PENDING' then 'Pending' else Null end as OPERATIONAL_STATUS,TYPE,UNIT_NUMBER,SPACE_SQFT,BUILDING_SQFT,BUILDING_TYPE,LEASE_Commencement_Date,LEASE_Expiration_Date 
FROM Retail.v_Site_RealEstate_Incremental WHERE change_type='Insert'
--and  upper(lease_type)  like 'EXPENSE%'
--and property_address not in ('3223 Elida Road')


union
SELECT B_CLASSNAME,B_CREDATE,B_UPDDATE,B_CREATOR,B_PUBID,B_SOURCEID,case when upper(OPERATIONAL_STATUS)='ACTIVE' then 'Active'
when upper(OPERATIONAL_STATUS)='INACTIVE' then 'Inactive'
when Upper(OPERATIONAL_STATUS) ='PENDING' then 'Pending' else Null end as OPERATIONAL_STATUS
,TYPE,UNIT_NUMBER,SPACE_SQFT,BUILDING_SQFT,BUILDING_TYPE,LEASE_Commencement_Date,LEASE_Expiration_Date FROM Retail.v_Site_RealEstate_Incremental WHERE change_type='Update'
--and  upper(lease_type)  like 'EXPENSE%'
--and property_address not in ('3223 Elida Road')

select B_SOURCEID,B_PUBID,'HomeStoreOperationProfitCenterTracking' as B_classname,
 GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,  
    GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,  
    'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
    'semadmin' AS B_UPDATOR,
      SITE_NAME,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,SITE_RAW_CITY,SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,SITE_RAW_COUNTY,FP_SITE_ID,FS_SITE_ID
from Retail.v_HS_OPC_Tracking_Incremental_RE
where change_type='Insert'
UNION
select B_SOURCEID,B_PUBID,'HomeStoreOperationProfitCenterTracking' as B_classname,
 GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,  
    GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,  
    'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR, 
      'semadmin' AS B_UPDATOR, 
    SITE_NAME,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,SITE_RAW_CITY,SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,SITE_RAW_COUNTY,FP_SITE_ID,FS_SITE_ID
from Retail.v_HS_OPC_Tracking_Incremental_RE
where change_type='Update'
